text: Looks like it's my lucky day! I get to see a cute house on the beach again.
I've been thinking about you. Did you think about me?

Who, me? I've been surfin', cruisin', and chillin'! 
 I missed giving you those pointers, you're a natural.

Dude, that's crazy! You gotta think about the waves too, 
 they totally rock for surfing these days.

Man, I hope you get it done soon! That way we can keep hangin' out. 
 I still gotta show you how fun the beach can be!

You know, with how much I've been thinking about you, 
 I think we really have a vibe dude. I want to know what you think about me.
Wow. If I don't see you again I know I'll regret it.

I really like you. I hope I can keep seeing you out here… 
 to surf of course! You're seriously one of a kind.
I'm glad you think so dude! Not what I meant though…
I hope we keep getting to know each other! You're pretty radical, dude.

I hope we get along better someday. 
 I hope you come around to some of the things I like, 
 and I'll learn about yours too.
I'll catch you later then. I hope you get to hang with the people you find chill.
